mapper.sql: id, group_name, boss_id, goods_id, price, number, start_time, stop_time, group_open_id, is_deleted
mapper.insert: insert into group_id ( boss_id, goods_id,price, number, start_time, stop_time, repertory ) values ( #{bossId}, #{goodsId},#{price}, #{number}, #{startTime},#{stopTime}, #{repertory})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into group_id
boss_id,
goods_id,
price,
number,

repertory,
is_deleted,

mapper.update:
update group_id
boss_id = #{bossId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
stop_time = #{stopTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{repertory,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update group_id set boss_id = #{bossId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, stop_time = #{stopTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, repertory = #{repertory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update group_id set repertory = #{repertory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
